links.title: These 8 Internet Companies Are Worth Over $1 Billion-But They Haven't Made a Dime
links.description: Twitter's long-awaited initial public offering is expected to arrive next week. But before you bust out your checkbook to own a piece of Silicon Valley's latest hyped stock, consider this: Twitter has yet to earn any money.

links.title: Here's Why Tesla Is Building Batteries for Your Home
links.description: May 1 -- Tesla is building a new generation of batteries that could power homes, businesses and even the grid. messages.body: $TSLA I've looked over multiple tech companies, did thorough evaluation and I've come to the conclusion this is the next 10 bagger
$TSLA Nike has a $92B market cap.  Toyota $150B, Tesla 49B.   Who do you think has a brighter future? Which one has exponential growth?
$TSLA ask yourself, would you pay $350 or $400 for this right now? That's what you are asking others to do. Too much future priced in.
$TSLA IBM has a 160B market cap, tesla $49B. Who do you think will be bigger 5 years from now.
$TSLA FYI..Love drawing lines!!
$TSLA great cars. Cool company. Grossly overpriced stock.
@trejaysee @CharlieMurphy not a $TSLA ?
$TSLA valuation vs growth potential. GM/F 0.17Xforward earning vs 7X forward earning 4Tesla. is that fair no but Investors belive in Tesla

links.title: Will Anybody Actually Use Tesla's Electric Semi Truck?
links.description: Elon Musk announced on Thursday his company's plan to unveil an electric semi truck in September. Musk said the truck, which would be an environmentally friendly alternative to diesel-powered trucks, is " seriously next level." But will trucking companies actually use them?

links.title: Tesla Powerwall Home Battery System Installation
links.description: Walt & Dani from Channel 10's Healthy Homes recently paid a visit while we were installing a Tesla Powerwall home battery system. Get more from your solar power system - learn more about Tesla Powerwall home energy storage here: http://www.energymatters.com.au/residential-solar/tesla-powerwall-battery/

https://youtu.be/OARwwN7PoA4

links.title: Why Tesla's "Powerwall" Battery Is Amazing
links.description: Tesla's "Powerwall" wall-mounted battery explained. Free audiobook: http://www.audibletrial.com/TheDailyConversation Subscribe to TDC: https://www.youtube.com/TheDailyConversation/ Like our page on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/thedailyconversation Join us on Google+ https://plus.google.com/100134925804523235350/posts Follow us on Twitter http://www.twitter.com/thedailyconvo Music: "Midnight" - Silent Partner - YouTube Audio Library "Sydney's Skyline" - ALBIS - YouTube Audio Library "Future Man Full" - AudioBlocks "Drive Away" - MK2 - YouTube Audio Library Tesla CEO Elon Musk introduced the world to the "Powerwall," a wall-mounted battery for your house which aims to accelerate our transition to clean solar and wind-power.

messages.body:
$TSLA Watch "What is Elon Musk Really Offering With the Home Tesla Battery?" on YouTube
https://youtu.be/3Zcii5x9mzQ

links.title: What is Elon Musk Really Offering With the Home Tesla Battery?
links.description: May 1 -- Jeff Chamberlain of the Joint Center for Energy Storage Research and Bloomberg's David Gura discuss the potential global impact of Tesla's announcement of a battery for use in homes and business, the challenge to store renewable energy and the market for a $3,000 battery to power your home.
